metadata.title: CVE-2022-47016 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason: This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigation showed that it was not a security issue. Notes: none.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tmux - 3.3a-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> this ended up not being a security issue. While lunar was not updated, it's no longer considered an issue

criterions.comment: tmux package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.3a-1ubuntu0.1').
